description: Defines a data transfer object (DTO) named GameStateDTO representing the current state of a game, including properties such as room code, current turn color, last dice roll, board state, and update timestamp.

classes.name: GameStateDTO
classes.description: A serializable Java class used to transfer game state information between server and clients, with getter and setter methods for each property.

methods.name: getRoomCode
methods.description: Returns the room code of the game session.

methods.name: setRoomCode
methods.description: Sets the room code for the game session.

methods.name: getCurrentTurnColor
methods.description: Returns the color of the current player whose turn it is.

methods.name: setCurrentTurnColor
methods.description: Sets the current player's turn color.

methods.name: getLastDiceRoll
methods.description: Returns the last dice roll result.

methods.name: setLastDiceRoll
methods.description: Sets the last dice roll result.

methods.name: getBoard
methods.description: Returns the map representing the current board state.

methods.name: setBoard
methods.description: Sets the map representing the current board state.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp of the last update.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the timestamp of the last update.
